reviewText: That´s a pretty fun and addictive game, just like it seems in the trailer. I´ve had a lot of fun with the characteres names and powers. It´s not that easy to unlock the last worlds. I only wish I could play multiplayer or had something to compare my records like a ranking. I would recomend this game to take a break between other major and sometimes serious games.
voteText: 9 of 13 people (69%) found this review helpful 1 person found this review funny

reviewText: Great to kill some time, no commitment and easy play. It's exactly what I expected it to be =)
